body.name: YUELAN 2 Packs 6040mAh Rechargeable Battery V4 for Ring, Video Doorbell 2/3/4, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, Stick Up Camera (2nd & 3rd Gen) & Spotlight Cam Battery Indoor & Outdoor Camera
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 7 mins
features: Works with Ring-Video Doorbell 2/3/3 Plus,/4, Battery Doorbell Plus, Stick Up Cam Battery/Solar (all gens), Stick Up Cam Pro Battery/Solar, Spotlight Cam Battery/Solar, Spotlight Cam Plus Battery/Solar/Wired, Spotlight Cam Pro Battery/Solar/Wired, Peephole Cam, Solar Floodlight.

LED Instructions: With simple signal indicators, it is easy to diagnose the charging status through the changing of red and green indicators. When red and green lights are on, the battery is starting charging. When the 2 lights both green, the battery is fully charged.
POWERFUL BATTERY CAPACITY: Premium cells create quality batteries. 6040mAh high battery capacity for continuous surveillance.
MULTIPLE CHARGING OPTIONS: The battery can be charged with any 5V USB ports like PC, car charger or power bank etc.
What you will get : 2pack replacement battery for ring , 1pcs dual charging station .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works wellfor ring doorbell.
reviews.reviewText: I wore the last one out. Hope these would work as well. Nice to have a spare on the charger. Only off line long enough to change battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product fits my Ring Doorbell Plus.
reviews.reviewText: I really needed the extra batteries to keep from having an 8 hour lag while my 1 battery charges. This product does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s good and have long life!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These actually possibly work better than the original Ring battery that came with our outdoor stickup cam.They charge super quick, hold a long charge and work well.Only cons I have are the charging port is a little less sturdy than the brand version one and you have to work a bit to pop them out of the charger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit in Ring cameras
reviews.reviewText: I installed one of these batteries in my ring camera about three weeks ago, and so far it is holding up well. It is the exact same size and dimensions as my factory ring battery, and other than it did not have the Ring brand on it, it appears to be the exact same battery. Time will tell how it stands up to multiple charge ,discharge and recharge cycles, but so far it's working well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, Long-Lasting Batteries - Perfect for Ring Devices
reviews.reviewText: The YUELAN 2 Packs 6040mAh Rechargeable Battery V4 is a game-changer for users of Ring devices. With an impressive 6040mAh capacity, these batteries provide an extended runtime, significantly reducing the frequency of recharging. This is particularly beneficial for Ring Video Doorbell 2/3/4 and Doorbell 3 Plus, as well as Stick Up Camera (2nd & 3rd Gen) & Spotlight Cam Battery Indoor & Outdoor Camera users.Compatibility is a key strength. These batteries seamlessly integrate with a wide range of Ring devices, ensuring a hassle-free experience. The installation process is straightforward, making it easy for anyone to replace their batteries without the need for professional assistance.The build quality deserves a mention. Robust and durable, these batteries are designed to withstand various weather conditions, making them suitable for outdoor devices. This durability is a huge plus, offering peace of mind that your security devices will remain operational in different environments.Another highlight is the rechargeable feature. It’s not only cost-effective in the long run but also environmentally friendly, reducing the need for disposable batteries. The charging process is quick and efficient, ensuring minimal downtime for your devices.While the product performs excellently, it’s important to note that regular maintenance and correct charging practices are essential to maximize battery life. Always follow the manufacturer's guidelines for charging and storage.In conclusion, the YUELAN 2 Packs 6040mAh Rechargeable Battery V4 is an excellent investment for Ring device users. Offering extended battery life, broad compatibility, robust build, and eco-friendly features, it enhances the convenience and efficiency of your home security system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Batteries work fine; charger base a bit tight
reviews.reviewText: The two batteries work well. They go into my Ring cameras with no issues and they charge up just like the original Ring batteries with the same LED charging indicators. The charging base allows two batteries to charge simultaneously. The only issue I have is the fit between the charging base and the batteries is very tight. Rather than just sliding in, it requires a bit of force to push the batteries into the charging base and two hands to take the batteries out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything I needed and then some. I have a ring doorbell that I could hardwire, but it'd be a royal pain. I decided to look for alternatives and figured multiple batteries would do the trick. Offbrand, but these things last just as long and work just as well as the one the doorbell came with. I have yet to even use the 3rd, because it's been so easy to just swap between the original and one of these as they run out. Small charger, so fits super well anywhere. I've made my kids watch for the battery notifications and swap them out for me at this point. Huge win finding this product.
